I cannot predict the future with certainty. however, it is likely that some of the changes adopted by the hospitality industry in response to the challenges they faced during the pandemic will become permanent in the future. 

for instance, many hotels will continue to prioritize cleanliness and safety to ensure the health of their guests and staff. contactless check-in and dining options, as well as digital room keys, may also become more common as hotels look to provide a more seamless guest experience. 

moreover, sustainability initiatives are likely to become even more important in the future as consumers become increasingly focused on environmental issues. the hospitality industry will have to continue to adopt sustainable practices to keep up with this trend.

in conclusion, while it is impossible to predict the future with certainty, many of the changes adopted by the hospitality industry in response to recent challenges are likely to become permanent as hotels and resorts continue to evolve to meet changing consumer preferences and demands.
